text:
Hey folks, we're looking for new team members. Especially folks who have a good understanding of the intersection of HubSpot - Salesforce Marketing world.
<https://ats.comparably.com/api/v1/gh/surveymonkey/jobs/4743533?gh_jid=4743533>
Looking for CMS developer to build pages/theme from designs and help to manage website backend including SEO (not required). Please DM me for more information.

BridgeRev is seeking to add a new HubSpot CMS or API Developer to my team. Oklahoma preferred, but remote friendly! <https://jobs.gusto.com/postings/bridges-revenue-growth-agency-HubSpot-developer-b77efd10-c45a-480b-b513-1b8c4353b7c8>
